Plot: Einstein died before he could solve his Unified Field Theory, in which Electromagnetics and Universal Gravitation are suposed to be united in a single theory discovering a virtual graviton. After receiving his IQ score in high school, the author of this book, Oliver Oyanadel was said to be the most intellectually advanced human being on the planet. When asked if he were an other Einstein, his teacher said, "Oh, he's way smarter than Einstein."
